title: You have to take care of a pet from a champion!
body:
Depending on your when your birthday is, <birth day> that you have to take care of for/until <birth month>. And if their pet isn't in the same as it was when they gave it to you, then they'll <next birthday's weekday>.

January - a weekend
February - a week
March - a month
April - start of the next season (e.g. winter, spring, summer, fall)
May - a year
June - your birthday
July - a day
August - 6 months
September - 2 weeks
October - next Feb 29
November - a Monday to Friday
December - the end of the next moon phase

Sunday - Lock you in a room with Teemo's laughter echoing for a day
Monday - Hit/shoot you with their weapon in the gut 3 times
Tuesday - Give you one of Pantheon's finest pies
Wednesday - Have Nocturne infuse you with your worst nightmare
Thursday -  Make you face off against a 6 stack Cho'gath
Friday - Get super enraged at you to the point where they would kill you, but they cool off before they would
Saturday - Get really sad and run away in disappointment, and you feel guilty

01 or 16 - Mordekaiser gives you a ghost of your last played champion
02 or 17 - Veigar gives you a purple caster minion that dances like Garen
03 or 18 - Annie gives you Tibbers!
04 or 19 - Taric gives you an blue melee minion that laughs like Nunu Bot
05 or 20 - Malzahar gives you a voidling
06 or 21 - Kayle gives you a purple melee minion that laughs like Lux
07 or 22 - Fizz gives you his shark
08 or 23 - Twitch gives you a blue caster minion that laughs like Teemo
09 or 24 - Elise gives you a spiderling
10 or 25 - Quinn gives you Valor
11 or 26 - Sejuani gives you her boar
12 or 27 - Ahri gives you a violent stealth ward
13 or 28 - Shaco gives you a Shaco-in-the-box
14 or 29 - Nunu gives you Willump
15 or 30 - Lulu gives you Pix
31 - Zyra gives you one of her plants

Example: If your birthday was Feburary 22 and your next birthday would happen on a Monday, then Fizz gives you his shark that you have to take care of for a week. If you fail him, he stab you with his trident 3 times in the gut.

What happens in your life while you take care of a pet? Share your story! :D

EDIT: Woooo! Rioter post! :D

replies.body: Kayle's giving me a purple melee minion that laughs like Lux. (I love Lux, so this is amazing.) It's only for two weeks, so I think we'll be okie. If I mess up, I'm getting locked in a room with Teemo's laugh echoing for a day.

Happy slightly belated birthday, birthday buddy!

EDIT: Just realised that while September 6 is on a Sunday next year, September 21 is on a Sunday *this* year, so we might not be birthday buddies after all. {{champion:32}}
I'm the 21st. :3

Ummm, I also have the purple melee minion that laughs like Lux... except for a year... I like Lux, but... I don't know if I could cope for a year. I might become as crazy as her. :p Also if I failed, I'd have to face off against a 6 stack Cho'gath... I am not going to have a good time.
so i have to take care of a voidling for a weekend and if i do it wrong i get a pie? ok i like pie im fine with this unless panth himself delivers it.
I get a ghost Gnar for a year? That... actually sounds kind of awesome. Although, I think I would feel more guilty about making ghost Gnar sad than Mordekaiser.

ugh, i got a jinx ghost... crap, either she'll kill me or cho'gath will eat me tomorrow.
i hate my birthday just now...

Elise gives me a spiderling until the end of the next moon phase. If something happens to Spinny, she'll give me one of Pantheon's finest pies?

What am I suppose to do, see that it transforms into the most terrifying spider there ever was for the next moon phase? **THAT'S TOO BIG OF AN ORDER TO COMPLETE! **

But then again, pie.. Wait these are bad pies, or is it a fairly good pie? Idk, someone help!
This is Pantheon we're talking about here.  How well he cooks is up to interpretation,
And I'm not even sure a voidling lasts 6 months D: Fuuuuuuuuuu

veigar is giving me a purple caster minion that dances like garen that i have to watch over for 2 weeks in a room with teemo's laughter echoing throught it 
I can handle that

I have to take care of Zyra's plant for a day and if I don't she will get super enraged at me to the point where she would kill me, but she cool off before she would.

Why couldn't I be born on May 3rd? :(
Ive been given one of Elise's spiderlings for a weekend. If I mess up, she'll get sad and run away in disappointment, leaving me with a guilty feeling.

Taric gave me a blue melee minion that laughs like Nunu Bot. He'll come back to pick him up on Friday. If I fail, Nocturne will make me see my worst nightmare! That minion will drive me crazy! Oh gawd... why!? D:
Actually, I might want to see my worst nightmare, for some reason. {{champion:161}} _{{champion:161}}

Oh dear.... Twitch gives me a blue caster minion that laughs like Teemo...and I have to take care of it until next February 29th! Whyyyyyyyy?! And if I mess it up I have to face off against a 6 stack Cho'Gath! Twitch is a giant jerk :c
Nunu gives me Willump for two weeks. If I fail, he will lock me in a room with Teemo's laughter echoing for a day

{{champion:82}}  would give me a {{champion:78}} Ghost to take care of until the end of the next moon phase. If I mess up, I would get one of {{champion:80}}'s finest pie.



Actually, it's not that bad!

Fizz gave me his shark. I will have to take are of it for two weeks, and if I mess up he'll stab me with his trident three times.

*hides* o.o

Okay, so {{champion:10}}  gives me a purple melee minion that laughs like Lux, which I have to look after til the start of next season, and if I mess up she'll stab me in the gut three times with her sword

If I did it right, I have to take care of Lulu's Pix until next February 29th... o_o

and if I fail... I have to face off against a 6 stack Cho (good thing I am friends with Vayne and she owes me a favour Kappa).
It took me so long to shuffle through the calendar and see what day of the week my next bday fell on, the pet died.
